document.full_text: pimco cut its holdings of japanese and u.s. government debt in the past six months due to their diminishing investment appeal, although japan's political turmoil is unlikely to trigger a spike in yields in the near term, the top bond fund's head of japan portfolio management said.
document.title: pimco says japan, u.s. debt losing investment appeal
lines_and_colors: pimco cut its holdings of japanese and u.s. government debt in the past six months due to their diminishing investment appeal, although japan's political turmoil is unlikely to trigger a spike in yields in the near term, the top bond fund's head of japan portfolio management said.
